Summary: 3 star-like objects traveling fast in a linear formation then shifting to triangular formation
divs: Sighting DetailsThe sighting occured today, May 18th 2012, 21h57. I have spent all evening in my backyard working on my company truck. I decided that it was all for today so I shut all of my outdoor lights. There was no neighbor outside and their exterior lights were also all shut. I went to the far end of my backyard and sat down on a chair, alone, relaxing and looking at the sky. A few minutes before the sighting, I spotted the usual planes and one possible satellite. My eyes were rapidly scanning the sky when something caught the corner of my eye. A "star" was traveling very fast across the sky, from west to east. As soon as I spotted the object, I tried to focus on it and follow it with my eyes : I was completely mind blown. There was a total of three star-like objects moving fast in a linear formation! They were surrounded by a very faint white disk-shaped halo. What happened after that just blew my mind: the objects steered to form a triangular formation. They regained their initial linear formation after about two seconds and I lost sight of the formation in the horizon. They made no noise, no blinking lights or no strobes. It was just like that: stars travelling at enormous speed. I got chills immediately afterwards, I knew that what I just saw was not of this earth. I've never seen anything like that before.
trends: There have been no other sightings in St-Agapit
This sighting has never been favorited.
